title: 谁知道怎么设置买地皮的价格啊，我不想让玩家免费得到地皮！求解！！！
author: 387800305@qq.co

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
.\plugins\PlotMe\config.yml
    economy:
      UseEconomy: true
      CanPutOnSale: false
      CanSellToBank: false
      RefundClaimPriceOnReset: false
      RefundClaimPriceOnSetOwner: false
      ClaimPrice: 0.0
      ClearPrice: 0.0
      AddPlayerPrice: 0.0
      DenyPlayerPrice: 0.0
      RemovePlayerPrice: 0.0
      UndenyPlayerPrice: 0.0
      PlotHomePrice: 0.0
      CanCustomizeSellPrice: false
      SellToPlayerPrice: 0.0
      SellToBankPrice: 0.0
      BuyFromBankPrice: 0.0
      AddCommentPrice: 0.0
      BiomeChangePrice: 0.0
      ProtectPrice: 0.0
      DisposePrice: 0.0
其他的参数自己看着修改

replies.txt_content:
